startup_steps.name: Change your password.
startup_steps.instructions: Click account to change your password.
startup_steps.description: In order to protect your security, we recommend that you change your password.

startup_steps.name: Create a profile.
startup_steps.instructions: Click profiles to create a profile
startup_steps.description: In 6DK, a profile is a virtual instance of a WMS. Profiles come with unique 6Dk-Tokens that you can use to interact with the development environment. You can also fill in your own test WMS details to test 6DK sending northbound confirmations to your interface.

startup_steps.name: Review the documentation.
startup_steps.instructions: Click docs to review the documentation
startup_steps.description: Here you can interact with our fulfilment automation system (FAS) APIs for WMS development.

startup_steps.name: Post a pick-wave
startup_steps.instructions: You can post a pick-wave from the docs or by posting directly to 6dk.6river.tech/*
startup_steps.description: Pick waves are groups of pick tasks where each pick task minimally includes the product to pick, the location to pick from and the quantity to pick.

startup_steps.name: Visit the feed
startup_steps.instructions: Click feed to see your messages
startup_steps.description: The message feed aggregates all messages for open profiles. You may search for messages and replay northbound confirmations to help with testing WMS development.
